description: A Disney animated production dealing with some of the issues of smoking. The central character decides to try smoking in an effort to gain respect from others. A courtroom scene occurs where the pros and cons of smoking are debated and eventually the hero decides not to smoke. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
